text: ( CNN ) The Tony Awards celebrated the best of Broadway on Sunday night. Josh Groban and Sara Bareilles, who co - hosted the awards show, kicked things off with a piano duet in which they poked fun at the fact that neither of them have won Tony or Grammy Awards. ` ` Neither one of us has ever won anything. So this is for the people who lose,'' the hosts sang. Both have made their Broadway debuts, Groban in 2016's ` ` Natasha, Pierre & the Great Comet of 1812,'' and Bareilles in 2017's ` ` Waitress.'' Andrew Garfield gave a passionate speech while accepting the award for lead actor in a play for his work in ` ` Angels in America.
